effect.name: VR360 Equirectangular to Rectilinear
effect.description: Converts an equirectangular frame (panoramic) to a rectilinear frame (what you're used to seeing). Can be used to preview what will be shown in a 360 video viewer. Delayed frame blitting mapped on a time bitmap
effect.author: Leo Sutic

parameter.name: yaw
Yaw
parameter.comment:
The amount to rotate the image
(nose moves from side to side).

parameter.name: pitch
Pitch
parameter.comment:
The amount to rotate the image
(nose up or down).

parameter.name: roll
Roll
parameter.comment:
The amount to rotate the image
(clockwise or anticlockwise rotation along the axis of movement).

parameter.name: fov
FOV
parameter.comment:
The horizontal field of view, in degrees, of the resulting frame.
Any value over 179 results in a fisheye projection.

parameter.name: fisheye
Fisheye
parameter.comment:
The amount of fisheye to mix in.
100 means that you get a 100% fisheye lens.
